description: A listing of all certified nursery growers and greenhouses which are licensed by the Department of Agriculture and Markets. Licensing of nursery growers and greenhouses is intended to prevent the introduction of injurious insects, noxious weeds, and plant diseases into the state.

metadata.attribution: New York State Department of Agriculture and Markets
metadata.description: A listing of all certified nursery growers and greenhouses which are licensed by the Department of Agriculture and Markets. Licensing of nursery growers and greenhouses is intended to prevent the introduction of injurious insects, noxious weeds, and plant diseases into the state.

name: Nursery Growers and Greenhouse
